meaningMnemonic: If a pilot manages to land under a <radical>canopy</radical> with a <radical>helicopter</radical> that's pierced with a sideways <radical>barb</radical> in the <radical>heart</radical> of <radical>winter</radical> you should <kanji>congratulate</kanji> them! People should always be congratulated for doing good things, and this is one of the best things you've ever heard of!
